body:
i paid 3145 and too much time in this motherfuckingbraindead game, 

Hey there,

Your account has been permanently banned after being escalated through multiple levels of punishment by our disciplinary audits. I'm sorry for all the things you have had to deal with lately, I really am. But your actions have crossed the line. The last time you were punished, we warned you that we do not condone extreme negativity of any kind. Considering that, we cannot look past this incident, no matter the circumstances surrounding it.

ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: idiot

ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: i dont care..

ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: ye im feeding 
ïuv mmmmmmmmmmm: let me show u real feeding

During the games in question, you created an extremely negative experience for your fellow Summoners. I know League can get pretty intense sometimes, but retaliating to such a degree is never an excusable or justifiable action. The language you employed demeaned your fellow Summoners to an extreme extent, which is never OK.

To see the most recent games which led to this action, please log in to the client to view your reform card. While we do our best at Riot Games to encourage reform, we permanently remove players who continue to create negative experiences from our game.

This action is only taken after repeated or extreme infractions and we will not lift the suspension under any circumstance.

Although this marks the end of the line, we’re confident that with some reflection you will be able to avoid this kind of situation with whatever new games you decide to play.

Best of luck in your future endeavors.

GeneralKrunchman
Diana Main

Player Behavior Support Specialist

"I speak only truth"



ye ,  lol ,  u never checking teammates chats,   they are doing nothign  and trashtalk to me ,

can u check my last game damage, 

my damage is best , 

i only dead 6 times,

i never feed 1 game in my life,  
i aways try my best play every single game ,  now  u banned me  .

its not fucking ok ,

riot

replies.body: So I make a racist implication towards people like this and apparently I'm being mean {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

"I make a racist implication"
And usually an unfounded or irrelevant one, so yes. Not sure why you'd think it's ok just because they're a meanie too.

Sorry when I said implication I was referring to a joke, such as questioning whether this is some random toxic Asian or a little kid who can't spell properly. I don't see what is "unnecessary" when this is clearly a troll post.

Joke or implication the problem is the racist part. There's more people than you'd think that actually believe that sort of stuff, and joking about it only perpetuates the harmful stereotypes, and for what purpose? To add an extra adjective to your "joke"? Seems rather meaningless doesn't it? 

If someone is an asshole it doesn't matter what colour their skin or their age or their first language, it's the asshole part that's relevant. Trying to link it to anything else only hurts your argument and makes you seem bigoted, whether or not you actually are.

Point being, keep the racist jokes between friends who share your sense of humour and off of public forums where impressionables are participating.

Goes to show how overly sensitive this community has become, only person being offended is the toxic guy making the troll post, good chance is he's not coming back to the game. I'm not straight up attacking him, it's a light hearted joke. Get over it.

Correction: "only person *you know of* being offended"

Just because someone hasn't voice their opinion (or, rather, voiced it in direct response) doesn't mean they don't find it offensive. The report function exists so people don't *have* to speak up publically about it, if they don't want to. You can say the community is simply "overly sensitive" as much as you want, but when it comes to more serious issues (like racism) it's certainly understandable for people to be offended.

I'd certainly recommend you take Seras' advice and keep that kind of attitude amongst groups you know will take no issue with it.

Right forgot I was speaking to the forum mod Nazi's who are an equivalent to a brick wall when trying to understand anything that's outside of Riots EULA, but that's exactly what you signed up for wasn't it? Always gotta make sure everybody's in place and following the rules ey? No fun allowed here, either comment "Well done!" or get off the boards. Take advice from 4chan and Reddit, i.e forums that people actually enjoy being apart of.

You realise this is an official Riot forum? And the the game is *13+* age recommended. I dunno about you but if I had impressionable (and often mean spirited) young teenagers of my own I wouldn't want them thinking it was ok to go around spouting hate to anyone you see, joke or otherwise. 

There is an argument for not being "too sensitive", but when it comes to *real world* issues that have *real world serious* impacts like racism, you have to respect the reality. Perpetuating racism/hate gets real people really hurt, like physically hurt. You really want to be a part of that for the sake of a cheap laugh?

It's funny how much trouble you're going to over a little joke said on the internet, the INTERNET. This forum site is like a Christian group compared to the rest of the social networking world. I've seen better enjoyable banter on fucking Facebook. If you're seriously THAT offended then I'll teach you a trick that you can do on the internet that you can't do in real life, turn off your computer and go outside.

You seem to have entirely missed the point but obviously aren't going to be convinced so I will only say that if you try for racist jokes on boards, they will be deleted, and if you continue to post them you will eventually be banned from boards entirely.

i can't even understand  ur gus sasying , but  can u help me ,  i really need help,

last game i never talk to my teammates at first,  but they are just give up  , they are never help me , 
 they are just blaming me and making me angry,

i said : ididot   because they are call me inting

i said : i will show u real feeding  beacsue :they are cal me feedung , but  i never feed once,

please believe in me,

the support person never check the replay  ,
they are just show me the chats , 

like that 4 sentencense,   but  thats just reply for my teammates, 

i never talk to them at first ,

i know i can't talk too much , because i got ban before,

but  its happened, 

i don't know what should i do,

i believe u can help me

If you want to have the issue resolve, chances are you best bet is to submit a ticket via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and go through the appeal process. Essentially spamming the boards will do no good to your situation.

To be honest, from what I've seen in your posts, there's not going to be any change to your situation. When it comes down to it, you are responsible for your actions, so talking about your punishment means the actions of others become irrelevant.

If there are other players who you've seen break the rules, and you believe there's been nothing done in regards to their situation, you can report them by submitting a ticket to Support (a different ticket to the appeal) and they will pass it onto the Player Behaviour team for further consideration.

If you want my suggestion, I'd recommend not getting involved with players who use chat to abuse, harass, offend and/or troll other players. You're just playing into their "game" when you do, and it can cause unnecessary problems for you if you're not careful how you handle the situation. Ignore them, use the mute feature if you have to, and report them in the post-game lobby. There's no need to put yourself in the line of fire for the sake of a few words.
